name: tlon
description: Read-only Tlon/Urbit API access. Use for checking activity, listing channels/groups, fetching message history, and looking up contacts.

args.description: Command and arguments to pass to tlon-run. Examples: 'activity mentions --limit 10', 'channels dms', 'contacts get ~sampel-palnet', 'groups list', 'messages dm ~friend --limit 20'
